task_specs.title: Advanced Search & Filtering System
task_specs.description: Implement comprehensive product search with Elasticsearch integration, multi-faceted filtering (price, category, brand, ratings), search result ranking algorithm, auto-complete and suggestions, and search analytics tracking. Success criteria: <200ms response time, 95% accuracy, 10+ concurrent filter support.

task_specs.title: Payment Processing Integration
task_specs.description: Secure payment gateway integration with Stripe (primary) and PayPal (fallback). Implement credit card tokenization, PCI DSS compliance, fraud detection hooks, refund and chargeback handling. Critical requirements: zero raw card storage, end-to-end encryption, transaction audit logging, 15+ currency support.

task_specs.title: Inventory Management System
task_specs.description: Real-time inventory tracking across multiple warehouses with stock level monitoring, automated reorder triggers, inventory reconciliation, product variants management, and stock reservation for pending orders. Technical constraints: <5s sync latency, 100k+ SKUs, 3+ warehouse locations.

task_specs.title: Recommendation Engine
task_specs.description: ML-based product recommendation system with collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, real-time updates, A/B testing framework, and performance metrics tracking. Depends on search system and user behavior tracking.

task_specs.title: Order Management Workflow
task_specs.description: Complete order lifecycle management including placement, confirmation, status tracking, shipping integration (UPS, FedEx, USPS), return/exchange processing, and order history. Integrates with payment system, inventory system, and email notifications.

task_specs.title: Setup Microservices Architecture
task_specs.description: Establish microservices architecture foundation for payment and inventory services. Set up event-driven architecture for order updates, Redis for caching/sessions, PostgreSQL for transactional data, and Elasticsearch for search.
